name: TheAppLabb
description:
TheAppLabb is a product innovation firm – focused on strategy, design and development of intelligent and immersive technology that will disrupt the status quo and drive business outcomes. Through design and improving traditional processes, we’re able to develop custom mobile solutions that provide a fantastic user experience. We differentiate ourselves from other app development companies based out of Toronto, Canada by putting skin in the game – nurturing your solution from the ground up.
We work with business start-ups, big brands, and industry disruptors
We provide strategic consulting, design, custom software development and pre-built industry solutions.
Retail (Mobile Commerce)
Real Estate for Agents and Developers
HR - Education and Training
Event Management
Service Apps for Delivery Services, Taxi/Transportation
Travel and Entertainment
Restaurants 
With eight global offices, we’ve built 500+ apps for more than 360 clients in the past ten years. Our clients include Unilever, Dell and Samsung.
Our expertise is in building solutions on emerging technologies:
Virtual and Augmented Reality
Artificial Intelligence
Digital Assistants and Chatbots
Blockchain
Internet of Things (IoT) - Solutions for Smart Watches, Glasses, Etc.
Mobile Applications for iOS and Android Platforms
Web Applications
If you’re looking to use emerging technologies to disrupt your industry, then you’ve found the perfect partner! Let’s turn your ideas into reality!
